title: With Me
description: Sophia isn't ready for what Jason is about to ask her - and she's determined to do everything she can to slow things down, without losing Jason forever.  If you liked Bared to You or Fifty Shades of Gray, you will enjoy this story!   After returning from a business trip, Jason acts distant. Sophia's paranoia is fueled when she sees a black jewellery box in his possession - is he going to propose? The question eats away at her as she figures out how to slow down their relationship without pushing Jason away.  Note: This is the fifth instalment of the Billionaire Next Door series. Although each story can be read individually, you will understand the story better if read in sequence!  The other instalments of the Billionaire Next Door are: All Yours (Book 1) For You (Book 2) My Love (Book 3) Just Us (Book 4)  **This 12k word new adult erotic romance contains strong language and explicit scenes. Adult readers only!***   keywords: m/f, new adult sex, billionaire bachelor romance
author: Violette Paradis
